exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros L1 L2 p H. unfold redacc in H. induction L1 as [|a1 L1 IH]. - simpl in H. apply H. - simpl in H. remember (nf (L1 ++ L2) a1) as u. destruct (zerop_dec u) as [Hu | Hu]. + apply IH. rewrite <- Hequ. apply H. + right. exists u. rewrite <- Hequ. apply H.
